Reviews.Title: nikon coolpix AW100
Reviews.Author: francis m russell
Reviews.Content: The nikon coolpix Aw100 .good pictures once you getting adequate light.still not SLR quality .not so good for night shots OR CAVES .GPS FEATURE never got it working properly and can drain your battery .in my opinion USEless.Waterproof feature : i have it two months .i do hiking and every time i go in water the glass gets fog up.i tried it under 2 feet water and it stopped working although.dealer Cameta Camera told me i got to send it back to nikon.When i tried too Nikon IS asking me for serial number that is not on camera. i love Nikon but this does not live up to its name.
